text: Curaçao competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Curaçao entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Seggio Bernardina |align=left|50 m butterfly |25.24 |=58 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |56.54 |57 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Rainier Rafaela |align=left|50 m breaststroke |29.23 |52 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m breaststroke |1:06.41 |71 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Chade Nersicio |align=left|50 m freestyle |27.13 |49 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |28.45 |41 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Curaçao at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Curaçao at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
